text: I'm an AI Engineer, passionate about driving innovation at the intersection of Artificial Intelligence and practical application. My expertise spans Natural Language Processing (NLP), Large Language Models (LLMs), and comprehensive full-stack development. From leading teams in deploying AI-powered solutions and building robust LLM training frameworks to crafting intuitive web and mobile applications, I thrive on transforming complex challenges into effective, user-centric products. My unique blend of skills allows me to approach problems holistically, from conceptual design and intricate research to scalable deployment. I'm always eager to take on new challenges and contribute to impactful projects that leverage the power of AI to solve real-world problems. Explore my Projects and Experience sections to see how I combine technical depth with creative problem-solving to deliver tangible results.
